todoGroupGetById: select * from t_todo_group t where t.id=? and t.ucenter_user_id=? and t.del_tag='0'
todoGroupAdd: insert into t_todo_group(id, ucenter_user_id, todo_group_name, todo_group_order, cdate, cuser_id, cuser_name, udate, uuser_id, uuser_name, del_tag) values(null, ?, ?, ?, now(), ?, ?, now(), ?, ?, '0')
todoGroupEdit: update t_todo_group t set t.todo_group_name=?, t.todo_group_order=?, t.udate=now(), t.uuser_id=?, t.uuser_name=? where t.id=? and t.ucenter_user_id=? and t.del_tag='0'
todoGroupDel: update t_todo_group t set t.del_tag='1' where t.ucenter_user_id=? and t.id in (?)
todoGroupListCount: SELECT count(*) tcount FROM t_todo_group t WHERE t.ucenter_user_id=? and t.del_tag='0'
todoGroupListQuery: SELECT * FROM t_todo_group t WHERE t.ucenter_user_id=? and t.del_tag='0'
